name: MyAccomplishmentKeeper
0:
”Alexa open my accomplishment keeper”
”Alexa open my accomplishment keeper and add”
”Alexa open my accomplishment keeper and delete”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my accomplishment keeper
des: My Accomplishment Keeper is a skill that helps students to track their activities and awards. This is helpful for filling out college and scholarship applications. The skill has many features including a list all feature that will list off all of the awards and activities that are stored. Users provide a name and short description and then categorize it by award or activity. The other features are add and delete so that you can add your newly made accomplishments or delete accomplishments for example if you got a better score on a test.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
